price: 34. Durriyad qaarkoodba ka yimid qaar,  Allena waa wax kasta Maqle,wax kasta Og.
arabic: ذُرِّيَّةَۢ بَعۡضُهَا مِنۢ بَعۡضٖۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: dhurriyyatan baʿḍuhā min baʿḍin wal-lahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
